name: Razor Projectiles
description: Ranged attacks can inflict Bleeding Wounds. Bleeding units suffer 4 <x-physical></x-physical> damage at the start of each combat round for 2 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Noxious Vulnerability
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Noxious Vulnerability. Noxious units suffer -2 <x-resistance></x-resistance> and -300 <x-morale></x-morale> for 4 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Enfeebling Fever
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Enfeebling Fever. Fevered units suffer -3 <x-defense></x-defense> and -300 <x-morale></x-morale> for 4 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Stun
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Stun. Stunned units cannot take actions and are always flanked for 1 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Shocking
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Shocking. Shocked units suffer -8 <x-mp></x-mp> and 40% <x-shock></x-shock> Weakness for 2 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Stunning Touch
description: Attempts to Stun target enemy unit. Stunned units cannot take actions and are always flanked for 1 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Frostbite
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Frostbite. Frostbitten units suffer -2 <x-defense></x-defense> for 3 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Chilling
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Chilling. Chilled units suffer -1 <x-defense></x-defense> and 20% <x-frost></x-frost> Weakness for 2 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Freezing Cold
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Frozen. Frozen units cannot take actions for 1 turn and resist Fire and Frost damage.

name: Inflict Exhausting Fatigue
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Exhausting Fatigue. Fatigued units suffer -3 <x-physical></x-physical> Melee strength and -300 <x-morale></x-morale> for 4 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Crippling Wounds
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Crippling Wounds. Bleeding units have -12 <x-mp></x-mp> for 2 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Severely Poisoned
description: Attacks from this unit can inflict Severely Poisoned. Severely Poisoned units take 4 <x-blight></x-blight> damage and -400 <x-morale></x-morale> for 3 <x-turn></x-turn> and cannot be healed on the Strategic map during that time

name: Dome of Frost
description: Units in a 1 hex radius are Exposed. Exposed units suffer -40% <x-frost></x-frost> Weakness, -1 <x-resistance></x-resistance> and 5 <x-frost></x-frost> damage.

name: Mountaineering
description: This units movement cost for walking through Mountains is reduced by 8 <x-mp></x-mp>.

name: Last Rite of Winter
description: Sacrifices unit to spread Arctic terrain in a 3 hex radius on the Strategic map.

name: Cave Crawling
description: This units movement cost for walking in the Underground is reduced by 1 <x-mp></x-mp>.

name: Barrens Running
description: This units movement cost for walking in Barrens is reduced by 1 <x-mp></x-mp>.

name: Fear Strike
description: Melee attacks can inflict Panic. Panicked units don't obey orders and attempt to flee

name: Cause Fear
description:
Attempts to Cause Fear Panic target enemy unit. If failed, the target unit is Shaken(2 . Panicked units don't obey orders and attempt to flee.
  • Can only be used once per battle

name: Throw Sun Spear
description:
Throws fiery spears target enemy unit.
  • Straight Shot
  • Does less damage at long range
  • Does not use Action Points
  • Cooldown 1

name: Sun Disc
description: Fires a beam that damages all units in a 4 hex line

name: Plains Running
description: This units movement cost for walking in Plains is reduced by 1 <x-mp></x-mp>.

name: Invigorate
description: Restores all movement and action points of target Tigran unit

name: Wetland Walking
description: This units movement cost for walking in Wetlands is reduced by 2 <x-mp></x-mp>.

name: Forestry
description: This units movement cost for walking in Dense Vegetation is reduced by 2 <x-mp></x-mp>.

name: Wetland Foraging
description: This unit heals an additional +9 <x-hp></x-hp> when on Wetlands terrain.

name: Life Steal
description: Restores 3-5 <x-hp></x-hp> every time the unit performs a melee attack against an enemy unit.

name: Guard Breaker
description: Melee attacks from this unit will stop the target from guarding.

name: Fey
description: This unit is Fey and has Forestry, Wetland Walking, and 40% <x-blight></x-blight> Weakness.

name: Regeneration
description: This unit regains 100% of its <x-hp></x-hp> Hit Points at the start of their owners turn.

name: Regrowth
description: This unit regains 20% of its <x-hp></x-hp> Hit Points each combat turn. Regains all its <x-hp></x-hp> Hit Points at the start of its owners turn on the Strategic map.

name: Fearsome
description: Every time an enemy unit performs an attack against this unit it has a chance to become Panicked. Panicked units donâ€™t obey orders and attempt to flee for 2 turns.

name: Movement Upgrade
description: This unit gains +8 <x-mp></x-mp>

name: Invisibility
description: This unit is invisible on the Strategic Map.

name: Blight Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when on Blighted terrain.

name: Wetlands Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when on Wetlands terrain.

name: Water Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when on Water.

name: Cave Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when Underground.

name: Urban Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when on Structures.

name: Mountain Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when on Mountains.

name: Forest Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when in Dense Vegetation.

name: Sprint
description:
This unit is able to sprint in combat. Sprinting gives an addition + 12 and avoids enemy Attacks of Opportunity.
  • Cooldown 3

name: Call Lightning
description:
Calls down Lightning that can Stun target enemy unit, Lightning deals splash damage to units and objects 1 hex around target.
  • Cooldown 1 , starts on cooldown
  • Requires 3 Action Points
  • No line of sight or range penalties

name: Befriend Animal
description:
Attempts to take control of target Animal, against Mounted units, ability causes Feral Mount. Units with Feral Mount suffer -12 and -400
  • Can only be used once per battle

name: Entangling Strike
description:
Melee attacks from this unit can Entangle targets. Entangled units cannot take actions for 2 .
  • Cooldown 1

name: Petrifying Touch
description:
Attempts to Petrify target unit. Petrified units cannot take actions for 2 .
  • Cooldown 1

name: Entangling Touch
description:
Attempts to Entangle target unit. Entangled units cannot take actions for 2 .
  • Cooldown 1

name: Throw Filth
description:
The unit hurls thick globs of indescribable filth at the target, doing damage and cursing the unit with a Disgusting Stench for 3 .
  • Does less damage at long range
  • Straight Shot
  • Cannot be used while unit is engaged
  • Cooldown 2

name: Defender
description: This unit gains an additional 20 % <x-defense></x-defense> and <x-resistance></x-resistance> bonus when in Guard Mode.

name: Rapid Reload
description: Reloads weapon of target friendly Machine or Musketeer to reset their cooldown.

name: Reload
description: Reloads this unit's weapon, allowing it to fire again next turn.

name: Cannot Regenerate
description: This unit doesnâ€™t regenerate Hitpoints

name: Machine
description: This unit is a Machine, Cannot Regenerate, and has 100% <x-spirit></x-spirit> Protection and 100% <x-blight></x-blight> Protection

name: Reinforced
description: This unit gains +4 <x-defense></x-defense> against ranged attacks.

name: Awakened
description: This Animal gains +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage and +500 <x-morale></x-morale>

name: Fire Blunderbuss
description:
Fires a spray of lead pellets at targed enemy unit.
  • Cone shaped attack
  • Cooldown 1

name: Fire Ballista
description:
Fires balista at target enemy unit.
  • Does less damage at long range
  • Straight Shot

name: Fire Pistol
description:
Fire pistol at target enemy unit.
  • Does less damage at long range
  • Straight Shot

name: Fire Musket
description:
Fire musket balls at target enemy unit. The impact has a chance for target to lose 50% . Machine, Elemental and Incorporeal cannot be effected by impact.
  • Unit must reload after using ability
  • Does less damage at long range
  • Straight Shot

name: Summon Erymanthian Boar
description:
Summons a legendary boar into battle to fight at your side until the end of combat.
  • Can only be used once per battle

name: Awaken Spirit
description:
Target friendly Animal gains +3 damage and +500 until end of combat.
  • Cooldown 1

name: Arctic Concealment
description: This unit is invisible when on Arctic terrain.

name: Sabotage
description: Deals 15 <x-physical></x-physical> and 15 <x-fire></x-fire> damage to target Machine unit, or 40 <x-physical></x-physical> damage to target wall

name: Smiting Prayer Bolts
description:
Shoots bolts at target enemy unit. Damage increased by +2 and +2 for each Devout unit you control on the battlefield.
  • Stright Shot
  • Does less damage at long range

name: Divine Vengeance
description:
Lays waste to an entire area by divine power Every unit in a 4 hex radius takes damage. Devout and Blinded units are immune.
  • Can only be used once per battle

name: Holy Relic
description: This unit heals 2 <x-hp></x-hp> for each Devout unit in the same stack on the strategic map.

name: Resurgence
description: When this unit dies in battle, it comes back after combat if its owner is victorious. Resurged units come back with 35% of its max Hit Points.

name: Unholy Champion
description: This unit deals +5 <x-fire></x-fire> against Devout, Fey, Animal, and Dedicated to Good units.

name: Holy Champion
description: This unit deals +5 <x-fire></x-fire> against Undead, Monster, and Dedicated to Evil units.

name: Terror from the Deep
description: This unit deals +6 <x-physical></x-physical> damage Embarked and Boat units.

name: Elemental Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Elemental units.

name: Electrical Skin
description: Electricity is constantly coursing through this unit's body. It gains 60% <x-shock></x-shock> Protection and any unit striking it in melee will take 5 <x-shock></x-shock> damage.

name: Something's Inside
description: There's something horrible growing inside this unit. When the unit dies, it will break free! Spawns another random unit when the original unit dies.

name: Hero Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Hero units.

name: Evil Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Dedicated to Evil units.

name: Good Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Dedicated to Good units.

name: Fey Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Fey units.

name: Righteous Zeal
description: This unit deals an additional +3 <x-fire></x-fire>, +3 <x-shock></x-shock> damage against Heretic units.

name: Undead Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Undead units.

name: Summon Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Summoned units.

name: Monster Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Monsters.

name: Animal Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Animals.

name: Animal
description: This unit is an Animal and has Forestry

name: Devout
description: This unit is Devout and deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Heretics.

name: Dragon Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Dragons.

name: Giant Slayer
description: This unit deals +3 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Giants.

name: Lesser Reanimate Undead
description:
The corpse of target friendly Undead Undead unit is brought back to life and heals 50%
  • Only affects Tier 2 and below
  • Can only be used oncer per battle

name: Lucky
description: 10% Attacks against this unit have a chance to miss. Chance increases with higher Morale.

name: Night Vision
description: This unit gains + 2 Vision range in the Underground.

name: Swimming
description: The unit is able to traverse Water.

name: Mind Control Immunity
description: This unit is immune to all Mind Control effects.

name: Shield
description: This unit gains +2 <x-defense></x-defense> against all non-flanking attacks.

name: Armored
description: This unit is Armored and has +2 <x-defense></x-defense>.

name: Demolisher
description: Deals +4 <x-physical></x-physical> damage to Machine Machine units and obstacles.

name: Irregular
description: This unit is an irregular

name: Walking
description: This unit is able to walk

name: Support
description: This unit is a Support unit and has True Sight

name: Cavalry
description: The unit is a Cavalry unit, is Mounted and has Charge

name: Tunneling
description: Unit can dig through Dirt Cavern Walls, turning them to Barrens. Gives 3-5 <x-gold></x-gold> per hex

name: Mounted
description: The unit is Mounted

name: Mariner
description: Embarking does not give the -3 <x-defense></x-defense> and -1 <x-resistance></x-resistance> penalty and gives extra +3 <x-mp></x-mp> when embarked

name: Frost Aura
description: Every time an enemy unit performs a Melee or Touch attack against the unit, the enemy receives 5 <x-frost></x-frost> damage and has a 9 <x-frost_res> </x-frost_res> chance to be Frozen.

name: Medidate
description:
Unit randomly receives one of the following: +3 Melee strenght, +3 Melee strenght, +4 Melee strength, 2 or 3 until end of combat.
  • Requires 3 Action Points
  • Can only be used once per battle

name: Blinding Aura
description: Every enemy that strikes this unit in Melee has a chance to become Blinded.

name: Elemental
description: This unit is an Elemental.

name: Fire Aura
description: Every time an enemy unit performs a Melee or Touch attack against the unit, the enemy receives 5 <x-fire></x-fire> damage and has a 9 <x-fire_res> </x-fire_res> chance to be Immolated.

name: Polearm
description: This unit deals +4 <x-physical></x-physical> Melee damage against Mounted, Flying, and Lesser Flying units.

name: True Sight
description: This unit is able to see units that are Concealed or have Invisibility

name: Armor Piercing
description: Deals +2 <x-physical></x-physical> damage against Armored units.

name: First Strike
description: This unit attacks first when defending.

name: Volunteer
description: This unit has -50% Upkeep.

name: Pike Square
description: This unit gains +3 <x-defense></x-defense> against Mounted, Flying, and Lesser Flying units.

name: Inflict Scorching Heat
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Scorching Heat. Scorched units suffer -3 strength for 3 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Scorching Projectiles
description: Ranged attacks can inflict Scorching Heat. Scorched units suffer -3 strength for 3 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Inflict Immolation
description: Melee and Ranged attacks can inflict Immolation. Immolated units suffer 3 <x-fire></x-fire> damage at the start of each combat round. They also suffers -1 <x-defense></x-defense>, -1 <x-resistance></x-resistance> -400 <x-happiness></x-happiness> and -2 <x-physical></x-physical> strength for 3 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Immolating Projectiles
description: Ranged attacks can inflict Immolation. Immolated units suffer 3 <x-fire></x-fire> damage at the start of each combat round. They also suffers -1 <x-defense></x-defense>, -1 <x-resistance></x-resistance> -400 <x-happiness></x-happiness> and -2 <x-physical></x-physical> strength for 3 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Infantry
description: This unit is infantry and has Wall Climbing

name: Sun Shield
description: This unit gains +2 <x-defense></x-defense> and +2 <x-resistance></x-resistance> to non-flanking attacks and 60% <x-fire></x-fire> Protection.

name: Bloodthirsty
description: Deals +4 damage against Bleeding units.

name: Martial Arts
description: This unit gains +5 <x-defense></x-defense> against enemy retaliations and Attacks of Opportunity.

name: Projectile Reflection
description: This unit reflects 50 % of all ranged damage it receives back to the attacker.

name: Coup de Grace
description: This unit deals +5 damage against Immobilized units.

name: Victory Rush
description: After winning a battle, this unit regenerates 10 <x-hp></x-hp>.

name: Blessed Arrows
description: This units ranged attacks gain +2 <x-spirit></x-spirit> damage

name: Monster
description: This unit is a Monster

name: Archer
description: This unit is an Archer

name: Improved Wall Climbing
description: This unit is able to climb city walls, without suffering a Wall Climbing Penalty

name: Wall Climbing
description: This unit is able to climb city walls, but suffers a wall climbing penalty

name: Lava Walking
description: This unit can traverse Lava

name: Lesser Flying
description: The unit can fly during tactical combat, but not on the strategic map.

name: Flying
description: Unit can fly over all terrain at a movement cost of 3 <x-mp></x-mp> per hex

name: Killing Momentum
description: Once per combat round, this unit gains 1 additional Action Point and can move 1 additional hex upon killing an enemy unit.

name: Vision Range Upgrade
description: This unit gains +1 Vision Range

name: Sea Creature
description: This unit is a Sea Creature.

name: Charge
description: This unit gains +6 <x-physical> </x-physical> damage on its first strike in melee combat if the unit has moved 4 or more hexes this turn.

name: Devastating Charge
description: This unit gains an additional +4 <x-physical> </x-physical> damage when Charging

name: Tireless
description: This unit spends no Action Points on retaliations and Attacks of Opportunity

name: Projectile Resistance
description: This unit is gains +2 <x-defense> </x-defense> against ranged attacks.

name: Minor Bard Skills
description: This unit gives its party + 200 <x-morale> </x-morale>.

name: Strong Will
description: This unit gains Mind Control Immunity and Spirit Protection 100% <x-spirit> </x-spirit> Protection

name: Athletics
description: This unit spends 5 <x-mp></x-mp> instead of 6 in Tactical Combat. Movement for Flyers is reduced to 4 <x-mp></x-mp>

name: Predator
description: This units deals +3 damage on Attacks of Opportunity.

name: Overwhelm
description: This unit is gains +3 <x-physical> </x-physical> against Pikeman, and (Sun) Shielded units.

name: Dedicated to Evil
description: This unit is Dedicated to Evil, and suffers <x-morale></x-morale> Penalties unless its owner is Evil.

name: Dedicated to Good
description: This unit is Dedicated to Good, and suffers <x-morale></x-morale> Penalties unless its owner is Good.

name: Dedicated to Neutral
description: This unit is Dedicated to Neutral, and suffers <x-morale></x-morale> Penalties unless its owner is Neutral.

name: Killing Spree
description: This unit regains 1 action point and according <x-mp></x-mp> are upon killing an enemy unit.

name: Pass Wall
description: This unit is able to pass through City Walls and other obstacles.

name: Inflict Spirit Breaking
description: Attacks from this unit can inflict Spirit Breaking. Units with Spirit Breaking have -600 <x-morale></x-morale> and -2 <x-resistance></x-resistance> for 2 <x-turn></x-turn>.

name: Incorporeal
description: This unit has Pass Wall and 60% <x-physical></x-physical> Protection. It is also unaffected by physical movement impeding effects.

name: Magical Origin
description: This unit is of Magical Origin and is susceptible to Banish and Arcane Binding Spells.

name: Summoned
description: This unit is Summoned and is susceptible to Banish and Arcane Binding Spells.

name: Webbing Touch
description: Attempts to Web target enemy unit. Webbed units cannot take any action, and are always Flanked for 2 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Memories of Joy
description: This unit awakens something in Undead that was thought long gone. All undead units in the stack gain +200 <x-morale></x-morale> Morale.

name: Exploit Despair
description: Unit takes advantage of the negative emotions in enemies. It does an extra + 2 <x-spirit></x-spirit> and + 1 <x-frost></x-frost> damage for each degree of low morale in its target

name: Decaying
description: This unit loses 8 <x-hp></x-hp> per turn on the adventure map.

name: Undead
description: This unit is undead and has Cannot Regenerate, 100% <x-blight></x-blight> Protection, 40% <x-frost></x-frost> Protection, 20% <x-fire></x-fire> Weakness, 40% <x-spirit></x-spirit> Weakness

name: Undying
description: This unit comes back to life after 2 <x-turn></x-turn> with 35% of itâ€™s Hitpoints. This effect only works once per battle

name: Floating
description: This unit can float and is able to traverse all terrain at a movement cost of 4. Except Mountains which cost 6 <x-mp></x-mp>, Road and Water cost 3 <x-mp></x-mp>. Only Cavern walls cannot be traversed

name: Greater Webbing Touch
description: Attempts to Web target enemy unit. Webbed units cannot take any action, and are always Flanked for 2 <x-turn></x-turn>

name: Doom Gaze
description:
Attempts to Petrify target unit. Petrified units units cannot take actions for 2
  • Straight Shot
  • Less damage at long range
